    A loooong night with amazing dancers
    To book tickets for the folklore show, you can either contact them via whatsapp to reserve, or they also have half the seats available through ticketmaster (with no fees). We booked through ticketmaster as we found this easier. The drinks were really well priced, and we had eaten before we came so didn’t have anything to eat. Everything is in Spanish so as a unilingual English speaker, sometimes you had to guess what was going on. This was different than similar shows I’ve been to in other countries in that it was interactive with the audience. There would be one or two cultural dances and then the MC would chat to the audience a bit, then the audience would be invited up on stage to dance for a song or two. The audience seemed to really enjoy this. It was fun to watch people dance, but I would honestly rather the show be 2 hours of the professionals dancing than 4 hours of the mix of pros and audience as it was a long time to stay there. They quality of the costumes and dancers was great & the service was attentive. We never felt pressured to order or buy anything, although we did have a few drinks that were delicious.
    Written April 23, 2024

    Authentic, entertaining, fun, engaging --> amazing!
    This is the best show I could imagine. There were many authentic Peruvian dances, with I believe 4 sets of dancers, There were a few individual songs when the audience could come to a big stage and dance, also amazing singing and jokes by the MC, and other audience participation. It is not a boring presentation of dances, but a show that keeps you interested and entertained for hours. Everything is good quality, but MC is just superb! And the price is lower than I would expect for such a quality of show.

reviews.title: Third time at Candelaria
reviews.text: Excellent show, music and dancing …the audience participation was exciting and well choreographed.  This has been our third time attending and each time it has been a very pleasant experience.

reviews.title: A Celebration of Peruvian Culture
reviews.text: Our group of 28 had an amazing time at La Candelaria! The show was a vibrant celebration of Peruvian culture, featuring traditional dances from all over the country. The energy was incredible, and the costumes were absolutely stunning.The MC kept the night lively and fun, and we loved how interactive the experience was—there were even moments when the audience got to participate! With our VIP tickets, we enjoyed a welcome Pisco Sour and a special drink for the kids.The attention from the staff was great, the atmosphere was festive, and the location is very accessible. This was a true highlight of our trip. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Lima!

reviews.title: Great Performance But Tourists Beware...
reviews.text: The Peruvian Dancers were top-notch, the MC made the show and the band was great, also. The mic and speaker system was not the best, the MC was hard to understand, at best. And the music was way too loud to be enjoyable for 4 hours.We purchased a few beers after lunch, paid for them in cash, and didn't realize that we were shorted $10 cash back. We didn't notice the shortage until we were on our way back to our hotel. We don't know if it was the waiter or the person at the register that ripped us off. Beware if you attend and double check that you receive the correct change. I would have rated the event much higher but could not do so knowing they have employees who took advantage. By the way, we tipped our water very well, not knowing we were ripped off!

reviews.title: La Candelaria de Lima
reviews.text: Very much enjoyed the show, but we rushed through very heavy, crazy Lima traffic to arrive before the published start time of 9:00PM, only to discover that the show actually started at 10:00. It was very late for a 3- hour show, but the wait and late start time were well worth it. The show was beautiful, the costumes gorgeous, and the MC was energetic and entertaining. The meal was nothing special, but at 11:00PM. I wasn’t that hungry anyway.
